Uses of Package
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process

Packages that use org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine The BPEL engine, support classes, and engine factory.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process This package contains classes related to process management.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test This package contains classes for testing the functionality of the recovery engine. 
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine
AeProcessWrapper
          Wraps a process with its reference count and state.
IAeProcessStateReader
          Defines interface for reading process state from storage.
IAeProcessStateWriter
          Defines interface for writing process state to storage.
IAeProcessWrapperMap
          Defines interface used by persistent process manager to map process ids to process wrappers (which are instances of AeProcessWrapper.
IAeProcessWrapperMapCallback
          Defines the interface for an instance of IAeProcessWrapperMap to call back to its owner.
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process
AeProcessWrapper
          Wraps a process with its reference count and state.
IAeProcessStateReader
          Defines interface for reading process state from storage.
IAeProcessStateWriter
          Defines interface for writing process state to storage.
IAeProcessWrapperMap
          Defines interface used by persistent process manager to map process ids to process wrappers (which are instances of AeProcessWrapper.
IAeProcessWrapperMapCallback
          Defines the interface for an instance of IAeProcessWrapperMap to call back to its owner.
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.test
AeProcessStateWriter
          Writes process state to persistent storage.
IAeProcessStateReader
          Defines interface for reading process state from storage.
IAeProcessStateWriter
          Defines interface for writing process state to storage.
